      • getOrdering

        public abstract IInputReader.InputOrdering getOrdering()
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Returns recognized ordering of input data. It may change during data processing. i.e. at first it's UNDEFINED, when greater value is loaded it's ASCENDING and if some of next value is lower it may change to UNSORTED.
        Specified by:
        getOrdering in interface IInputReader
        Returns:

                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Loads next run (set of records with identical keys)
        Specified by:

      • next

        public abstract DataRecord next()
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Retrieves one record from current run. Modifies internal data so that next call of this operation will return following record.
        Specified by:
        next in interface IInputReader
        Returns:
        null on end of run, retrieved record otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • rewindRun

        public abstract void rewindRun()
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Resets current run so that it can be read again.
        Specified by:
        rewindRun in interface IInputReader

      • getSample

        public abstract DataRecord getSample()
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Retrieves one record from current run. Doesn't affect results of sebsequent next() operations.
        Specified by:
        getSample in interface IInputReader
        Returns:

      • compare

        public abstract int compare(IInputReader other)
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Compares reader with another one. The comparison is based on key values of record in the current run
        Specified by:
        compare in interface IInputReader
        Returns:
